title: No Rotating game mode queue on the new client
body:
Yup, not available in the new client. And I was excited using the new client too. If you want to use the old client, just click on the 'Launch legacy client' on the bottom right corner of the new client.

If that didn't work (like mine), go to your League of Legends folder (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and double click lol.launcher.exe, that will launch the old client instead, and you'll get to play the Rotating game mode queue.

replies.body: Thanks dude, i didnt even know there was a launch legacy client option.
